nodes.text: Doruk, also known as Doruk, the Uncaged, was a male Sith who was part of the Infernal Council, a group of Sith enslaved by the Rakata warlord Soa and imprisoned with him in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis.

Doruk, the Uncaged appears as one of the enemies in the Infernal Council boss encounter in the "Eternity Vault" Operation in the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. Doruk only appears in the sixteen-man difficulty modes of the operation.
